alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero and east central Dona Ana Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near White Sands Missile Range Headquarters, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orogrande, Las Cruces, White Sands National Monument, White Sands Missile Range Headquarters, NMSU Main Campus, Mesilla, Organ, Fairacres, Talavera, East Mesa, San Pablo, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range, Northeast Las Cruces, Dripping Springs, Aguirre Springs, Portions of Organ Mountains Desert Peaks National Monument, Soledad Canyon and Lake Lucero. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 138 and 149. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 7. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 187. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 24 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
